mapper.select: SELECT runningNo FROM runningSchedule ss, (SELECT r.routeNo FROM route r, (SELECT stationNo src FROM station) s, (SELECT stationNo dest FROM station) d WHERE r.src = s.src AND r.dest = d.dest) rr, (SELECT trainNo FROM train WHERE trainNo = #{trainNo} AND LOWER(type) = LOWER(#{tType})) tr WHERE ss.routeNo = rr.routeNo AND ss.trainNo = tr.trainNo AND TO_CHAR(departureTime, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{dT} AND TO_CHAR(arrivalTime, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{aT}

SELECT c.carNo FROM (SELECT carNo, trainNo, type, moddate FROM car) c, (SELECT trainNo, type, moddate FROM train WHERE trainNo = #{trainNo} AND LOWER(type) = LOWER(#{tType})) t WHERE c.trainNo = t.trainNo ORDER BY c.carNo

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (DECODE(SUBSTR(s.seatName, LENGTH(s.seatName)), 'A', 1000, 'B', 2000, 'C', 3000, 'D', 4000, 5000) + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(s.seatName, 1, LENGTH(s.seatName) - 1))) ASC) -1 cnt,s.seatNo, s.carNo, LPAD(s.seatName, 3, '0') seatName, SUBSTR(s.seatName, 1, LENGTH(s.seatName) - 1) seatNameNumber, SUBSTR(s.seatName, LENGTH(s.seatName)) seatNameLabel FROM seat s, (SELECT carNo, trainNo FROM car WHERE carNo = #{carNo}) c, (SELECT trainNo FROM train WHERE trainNo = #{trainNo} AND LOWER(type) = LOWER(#{tType})) t WHERE s.carNo = c.carNo AND c.trainNo = t.trainNo

SELECT seatNo FROM ticket WHERE runningNo = #{runningNo} AND seatNo IN( SELECT s.seatNo FROM seat s, (SELECT carNo, trainNo FROM car WHERE carNo = #{carNo}) c, (SELECT trainNo FROM train WHERE trainNo = #{trainNo} AND LOWER(type) = LOWER(#{tType})) t WHERE s.carNo = c.carNo AND c.trainNo = t.trainNo )
